name: Children's Program
description: St. Vincent de Paul Society offers trauma-informed, youth-centered programming and case management for children and their parents/guardians.
fullDescription: St. Vincent de Paul Society offers trauma-informed, youth-centered programming and case management for children and their parents/guardians.
whatTheyOffer: St. Vincent de Paul Society offers trauma-informed, youth-centered programming and case management for children and their parents/guardians who have been impacted by domestic violence. Drop-In Hours: Mondays 1:00pm-4:30pm Thursdays 9:30am-11:30am Phone: (415) 552-2943 To join a support group or for more information about the Children’s Program, call (415) 255 – 2894 To join a support group, call (415)255-2894.
